mapper.insert: insert into TB_YOFISHDK_AUTH_MSG_CONFIG(id,MSG_MODULE,MSG_CHANNEL,MSG_TARGET,START_TIME,END_TIME, is_run,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_USER) values (SEQ_TB_YOFISHDK_AUTH_MSG_CONFIG.nextval,#{msgModule, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{msgChannel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isRun, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
